info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued September 08 at 7:20PM EDT by NWS Wakefield
info.description: ...A STRONG THUNDERSTORM WILL IMPACT SOUTHWESTERN CUMBERLAND... EASTERN PRINCE EDWARD...NORTHWESTERN LUNENBURG AND WEST CENTRAL NOTTOWAY COUNTIES THROUGH 745 PM EDT... At 720 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Hampden Sydney College, moving north at 15 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 40 mph and half inch hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor hail damage to vegetation is possible. This strong thunderstorm will be near... Farmville, Hampden Sydney College, and Hampden Sydney around 725 PM EDT. Longwood University around 730 PM EDT. Other locations impacted by this storm include Briery Creek Lake, Tuggle, Prince Edward Station, Arvins Store, Twin Lakes State Park, Nutbush, Scholfield, Kingsville, Reeds, and Virso. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.50 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
